data.comment: The match is underway. Tondela have kicked-off.
Throw-in for Tondela in the half of Maritimo.
In the minute 2, Free kick Tondela.
Can Tondela get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Maritimo's half?
Goal kick for Tondela at Estadio do Maritimo.
In the minute 4, Tondela awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in Maritimo.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 6, Andre Narciso awards the away team a throw-in.
Tondela awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Ball safe as Tondela is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 7, Andre Narciso signals a free kick to Tondela in their own half.
Throw-in for Maritimo at Estadio do Maritimo.
Tondela to take a throw-in in Maritimo territory.
In the minute 8, Andre Narciso signals a Tondela throw-in in Maritimo's half.
Andre Narciso signals a Tondela throw-in in Maritimo's half.
Free kick for Maritimo in their own half.
In the minute 10, Free kick for Maritimo in their own half.
In Funchal Maritimo attack through Rodrigo Pinho. The finish is off target, however.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Funchal.
In the minute 11, Throw-in for Maritimo in their own half.
Corner awarded to Tondela.
Throw-in for Tondela close to the penalty box.
In the minute 13, Throw-in for Maritimo at Estadio do Maritimo.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Tondela have a goal kick.
In the minute 14, Babacar Niasse Mbaye is down and play has been interrupted for a few moments.
Babacar Niasse Mbaye returns to the field for Tondela after picking up a slight injury.
Tondela's Pedro Augusto gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Maritimo defender.
In the minute 18, Maritimo's Rodrigo Pinho has run offside.
Free kick for Tondela in the half of Maritimo.
Tondela awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 22, Andre Narciso signals a free kick to Tondela.
Maritimo pushes forward through Claudio Winck, whose finish on goal is saved.
Andre Narciso signals a free kick to Tondela in their own half.
In the minute 23, Tondela to take a throw-in in Maritimo territory.
In Funchal a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Ball safe as Tondela is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 25, Can Tondela get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Maritimo's half?
Maritimo awarded a free kick in their own half.
Edgar Costa of Maritimo gets in a strike, but is off target.
In the minute 27, Andre Narciso awards Tondela a goal kick.
Free kick for Tondela in their own half.
Free kick Tondela.
In the minute 27, Jean Irmer is booked for the home team.
Andre Narciso signals a free kick to Maritimo in their own half.
Free kick for Maritimo in the half of Tondela.
In the minute 30, Maritimo are too eager and fall into an offside trap.
Tondela are coming forward and Filipe Ferreira gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Ball goes out of play for a Maritimo goal kick.
In the minute 31, In Funchal a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Tondela are caught offside.
Important block from the Maritimo defence as Joao Pedro fires in a strike for Tondela.
In the minute 33, Maritimo awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for Tondela in the half of Maritimo.
Can Tondela get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Maritimo's half?
In the minute 34, Rodrigo Pinho puts the ball in the net and the home team now lead 1-0.
That's a fine assist from Fabio China.
Maritimo to take a throw-in in Tondela territory.
In the minute 37, Andre Narciso signals a free kick to Maritimo in their own half.
The match has been stopped briefly for attention to the injured Rodrigo Pinho.
Andre Narciso signals a Maritimo throw-in in Tondela's half.
In the minute 40, Rodrigo Pinho has recovered and rejoins the match in Funchal.
Maritimo's Rodrigo Pinho is whistled for offside at Estadio do Maritimo.
Maritimo will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Tondela.
In the minute 41, Fabio China Maritimo.
Goal! The away team draw level at 1-1 through Pedro Augusto.
4 minutes will be added to the 1st half in Funchal.
Tondela have been awarded a corner by Andre Narciso.
In the minute 45, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Throw-in Tondela.
Tondela needs to be cautious. Maritimo have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 45, Andre Narciso blows to end the first-half.
Lito Vidigal (Maritimo) is making a first substitution, with Marcelo Hermes replacing Jean Cleber.
In the minute 45, Goal! Rodrigo Pinho gives Maritimo a 2-1 lead.
It's Maritimo with the kick-off after the break.
Andre Narciso signals a free kick to Maritimo.
The away team replace Filipe Ferreira with Joao Mendes.
In the minute 46, Mohamed Naoufel Khacef is replacing Pedro Augusto for the away team.
Bebeto (Tondela) has received a first yellow card.
In the minute 47, Maritimo push upfield and Zainadine Junior gets his head to the ball. The attempt is cleared by an alert Tondela defence.
Play has been temporarily suspended for attention to Zainadine Junior for Maritimo who is writhing in pain on the pitch.
Throw-in for Tondela in the half of Maritimo.
In the minute 49, Play has been interrupted briefly in Funchal to check on Amir Abedzadeh, who is grimacing with pain.
Zainadine Junior for Maritimo is back on the field again.
Amir Abedzadeh is back on his feet again.
In the minute 51, Tondela's Rafael Barbosa attacks the ball with his head but his effort fails to hit the target.
Goal kick for Maritimo at Estadio do Maritimo.
Free kick Tondela.
In the minute 52, In Funchal a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Tondela's Salvador Agra misses with an attempt on goal.
Andre Narciso awards Maritimo a goal kick.
In the minute 54, Throw-in for Maritimo in their own half.
Andre Narciso signals a Tondela throw-in in Maritimo's half.
Andre Narciso signals a throw-in for Tondela, close to Maritimo's area.
In the minute 55, Throw-in for Tondela in the half of Maritimo.
Tondela have been awarded a corner by Andre Narciso.
Andre Narciso awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 58, Tondela's Rafael Barbosa is on target but unsuccessful.
Corner awarded to Tondela.
Tondela's Rafael Barbosa gets his shot away but it misses the target.
In the minute 59, Ball goes out of play for a Maritimo goal kick.
Throw-in high up the field for Tondela in Funchal.
Free kick for Maritimo in their own half.
In the minute 60, Joao Pedro (Tondela) gets a yellow card.
Getterson is writhing in pain and play has been suspended for a few moments.
Maritimo’s Getterson is on his feet again at Estadio do Maritimo.
In the minute 62, Tondela awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in Maritimo.
Free kick for Maritimo in their own half.
In the minute 64, Free kick for Maritimo in the half of Tondela.
Tondela awarded a free kick in their own half.
Maritimo's Marcelo Hermes has been booked in Funchal.
In the minute 66, Maritimo have a goal kick.
The away team have replaced Bebeto with Jhon Murillo. This is the third substitution made today by Pako Ayestaran.
Edgar Costa (Maritimo) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
In the minute 69, Tondela to take a throw-in in Maritimo territory.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Tondela have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 72, Can Tondela capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Maritimo's half?
It's getting dangerous! Free kick for Tondela close to the penalty box.
Corner awarded to Tondela.
In the minute 74, Throw-in for Tondela at Estadio do Maritimo.
Andre Narciso signals a throw-in for Tondela, close to Maritimo's area.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Funchal.
In the minute 76, Dejan Kerkez is on a sub for Edgar Costa for Maritimo.
Andre Narciso signals a free kick to Tondela just outside Maritimo's area.
Pako Ayestaran is making the team's fourth substitution at Estadio do Maritimo with Ruben Fonseca replacing Tomislav Strkalj.
In the minute 79, Tondela make their fifth substitution with Arcanjo replacing Rafael Barbosa.
Tondela's Joao Mendes gets in a shot on goal at Estadio do Maritimo. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Can Tondela get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Maritimo's half?
In the minute 80, Amir Abedzadeh is down and play has been interrupted for a few moments.
Maritimo's Amir Abedzadeh is back in action after a slight knock.
Andre Narciso signals a free kick to Tondela.
In the minute 84, Andre Narciso signals a free kick to Maritimo.
In Funchal a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Claudio Winck for Maritimo has been booked by Andre Narciso and receives a first yellow card.
In the minute 86, Ball safe as Maritimo is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Tondela have been awarded a corner by Andre Narciso.
Tondela are pushing forward but Arcanjo's finish is wide of the goal.
In the minute 88, It's a goal kick for the home team in Funchal.
Andre Narciso signals a free kick to Tondela in their own half.
The match at Estadio do Maritimo has been interrupted briefly for a check on Amir Abedzadeh, who is down injured.
Amir Abedzadeh is back on the pitch.
Andre Narciso signals a free kick to Maritimo in their own half.
Andre Narciso will wait an extra 8 minutes before blowing the whistle to end the 2nd half.
Tondela have been awarded a corner by Andre Narciso.
Maritimo awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Throw-in for Tondela close to the penalty box.
Throw-in for Tondela in the half of Maritimo.
Free kick for Maritimo in their own half.
Salvador Agra of Tondela smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Andre Narciso awards the away team a throw-in.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Throw-in for Maritimo in their own half.
Corner awarded to Tondela.
Goal kick for Maritimo at Estadio do Maritimo.
That's full-time at Estadio do Maritimo. The final score is 2-1.
Maritimo make their third substitution with Joel replacing Rodrigo Pinho.
Jorge Correa is on a sub for Getterson for Maritimo.
Pedro Pelagio is replacing Jean Irmer for the home team.
